=====================================

**Tender Notice: Snow Removal and Ice Control Services in Fredericton**

**Contract Reference:** WS4641444895-Doc4641474472

**Publication Date:** June 18, 2024

**Closing Date:** August 2, 2024, at 14:00 (Eastern Time)

**Request for Proposal:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites sealed bids for Snow Removal and Ice Control Services in Fredericton. The Government of Canada has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for this opportunity.

**Eligibility:**

* All qualified contractors are eligible to participate in this bid.
* This procurement is open to Canadian and foreign firms.

**Services Required:**

* Provide snow removal and ice control services within the city of Fredericton.
* Services must be executed in accordance with the Canada-New Brunswick Rural Roads Maintenance Criteria.

**Procurement Details:**

* **Contract Reference:** WS4641444895-Doc4641474472
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4641444895
* **Bid Closing Date:** August 2, 2024, at 14:00 (Eastern Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** October 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** April 30, 2025

**Tender Conditions:**

* Submissions must be in compliance with the proposed contract.
* Bidder must demonstrate relevant expertise, qualifications, and experience.

**Notice:**

This Opportunity is Expiring. Please submit your bids before the Closing Date and Time to be considered. A bid invitation is available on the Government of Canada's Bid Registry, with more information on this Opportunity. To contact the Bid Holder, please contact Kate Mintzer (elle-la/her) at: kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca, or 

You may access the bids through this link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20053714?extsite=MjAwNTM3MTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==;						
.
